arduinoLight.events

Class EventDispatchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduinoLight.events.EventDispatchHandler

  • public class EventDispatchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a singleton and provides global access to dispatch Events. A ThreadPool is used to fire dispatched Events. Events are fired FIFO.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispatch(Event event)
      Dispatches a given Event for later concurrent execution.
      static EventDispatchHandler getInstance()
      Returns the instance of this Singleton.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
